title: players who ban champions that your teammates want to play SHOULD BE BANNED
body: when someone got autofilled, it happends sometimes to ask to switch lane with someone. IN last time, when i refuse to give them my top thay just ban my champ and say gg i trol. Why that players get ban?

replies.body: apparently they arent getting punished, cuz according to riot, "Riot has decided that players have the right to ban whatever they want" straight quoting from The Djinn.

There is no punishment for banning another players champ. If they do so and then steal your role, you can report that. If they go through and actually troll in game, you can report. However, the simple action of banning a champ is not considered trolling.
